tool.name: SAGA.shapes_grid.18
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPOLYGONS False isArrayGRID False isArrayGRID_LUT False isArrayGRID_LUT_MIN False isArrayGRID_LUT_MAX False isArrayGRID_LUT_NAM False output_data_RESULT $output_data_RESULT name SAGA.shapes_grid.18 POLYGONS $POLYGONS GRID $GRID METHOD $METHOD GRID_VALUES $GRID_VALUES GRID_LUT $GRID_LUT GRID_LUT_MIN $GRID_LUT_MIN GRID_LUT_MAX $GRID_LUT_MAX GRID_LUT_NAM $GRID_LUT_NAM prefer $prefer response $response outputType_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.outputType_RESULT transmissionMode_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.transmissionMode_RESULT

param.name: POLYGONS
param.label: Polygons
param.help: Polygons The following data types are allowed in the txt file: vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, json, xml

param.name: GRID
param.label: Grid
param.help: Grid The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, png, x-ogc-envi

param.name: GRID_LUT
param.label: Look-up Table
param.help: Look-up Table The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: GRID_LUT_MIN
param.label: Value
param.help: Value The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: GRID_LUT_MAX
param.label: Value (Maximum)
param.help: Value (Maximum) The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: GRID_LUT_NAM
param.label: Name
param.help: Name The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_RESULT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_RESULT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Calculates for each polygon the area covered by each grid class.
